short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear cookies for the current tab, then reload the page (optional).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cookie Cutter is a simple and efficient tool designed to clear cookies for the current tab, helping you manage your browsing experience with ease. With just a click, it removes all first-party cookies for the active site, allowing you to regain access to content or refresh your session. PLEASE NOTE: You may see a Chrome warning about the extension being able to "read and change all your data on websites you visit." This is ONLY because Cookie Cutter needs permission to clear cookies on the current tab. The extension DOES NOT COLLECT, STORE, OR SHARE ANY PERSONAL DATA.

Features:

- Clear cookies for the current tab with a single click.

- Removes only first-party cookies, leaving third-party cookies unaffected.

- Simple interface with an easy-to-use "Clear" and optional "Refresh" button.

- Lightweight and efficientâ€”ideal for quickly managing cookies without clearing local storage or session storage.
